item.description: Jordan B. Kinder is a citizen of the MÃ©tis Nation of Alberta and Research Director of the Petrocultures Research Group. He holds a PhD in English and Film Studies from the University of Alberta where he wrote a dissertation that studies the cultural politics of energy, media, infrastructure, and environment through a case study of the burgeoning pro-oil social movement in Canada. His work appears in Energy Culture: Art and Theory on Oil and Beyond, The Bloomsbury Companion to Marx, Socialism and Democracy, Mediations, TOPIA: A Journal of Canadian Cultural Studies, and elsewhere.
